document.bingtitle: Study looks at NYC fast-food menu calorie counts - Yahoo! News
document.webtitle: Study looks at NYC fast-food menu calorie counts - Yahoo! News
document.description: Researchers asked nearly 16,000 customers for their receipts and spoke to them ... Maybe if you looked at what's in the food you eat you wouldn't be so fat, bytch teats.
